```{r packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
```

```{r data}
colors <- read_csv("~/R/project-2-stats_r_us/Data/wikipedia_x11_colors.csv")
colors <- colors %>%
  mutate(r = `Red (8 bit)`) %>%
  mutate(b = `Blue (8 bit)`) %>%
  mutate(g = `Green (8 bit)`) %>%
  arrange(-b, -g, -r) %>%
  select(r, b, g)

colors <- colors[1:144,]
```


```{r play with rgb}
pal <- rgb(colors$r, colors$g, colors$b, max = 255)
show_col(pal, borders = "black", labels = FALSE, ncol = 12)
```
